subject: Hockey, Ice
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Price got 27 of the 30 first-place votes for his first Vezina Trophy after leading the N.H.L. with 44 wins, a 1.96 goals-against average and a .933 save percentage.
snippet: Price got 27 of the 30 first-place votes for his first Vezina Trophy after leading the N.H.L. with 44 wins, a 1.96 goals-against average and a .933 save percentage.
